tool_description:
This API endpoint returns the Autonomous System (AS) information of an IP or ASN: ASN, Country  and Name.

Moocher.io is a set of lists like IP, domains, emails, passwords, creditcard BIN/IIN. Some of them marked as 'abusers' by several groups and initiatives of users and communities, and others used to filter out potential abusers. 

Moocher.io can be defined as a Look up as a Service for developers and product companies that want to know in realtime if their existing or potential users have been classified as 'abusers' by one or more of these lists.
name: Autonomous System Information
title: Autonomous System Information

api_list.name: Get the AS identified by the number passed as argument
api_list.description: The endpoint returns the name and country of the AS number passed as argument.

api_list.name: Get the AS that owns the IP passed as argument
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the AS number, the name and the country that owns the IP.
